description.h2: A company extension reference linkbase must not add, remove or change references for any element declared in a standard taxonomy schema.
description.p: REMARK: 6.19 reads "A company extension also cannot remove or change references in standard taxonomies (this is a technical consequence of the rule prohibiting URI fragments other than shorthand xpointers)." but this does not explicitly say the obvious point that you can't ADD authoritative references, either.

variation.name: 6.18.2, Local reference for standard element exists, NOGOOD.
variation.description: Local reference for standard element exists, NOGOOD.
